alert.note: Alert for Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains (Utah) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued June 29 at 3:36PM MDT by NWS Saltlake
info.description: ...A strong thunderstorm will impact portions of southwestern Tooele County through 415 PM MDT... At 336 PM MDT, Doppler radar was tracking a strong thunderstorm 15 miles northeast of Ibapah, or 37 miles south of Wendover, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts up to 50 mph and pea size hail. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. Minor damage to outdoor objects is possible. Locations impacted include... Utah Test and Training Range South and Dugway Proving Ground Test Range. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.25 IN MAX WIND GUST...50 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.

area.areaDesc: Great Salt Lake Desert and Mountains
